en: My father's hair has grown white.
zh: 我爸头发白了。

en: Father's hair has turned gray.
zh: 我爸头发变白了。

en: My father's head has turned gray.
zh: 我爸头发全白了。

en: My father's birthday falls on Sunday this year.
zh: 我爸今年的生日是星期天。

en: My father's success counts for nothing to me.
zh: 我爸的成功对我来说根本不算什么。

en: It was then that my father's reproof had come home to me.
zh: 那时我才真正领会到我爸对我的责备。

en: My father's car is new.
zh: 我爸的车是新的。

en: My father's hobby is growing roses.
zh: 我爸的爱好是种玫瑰。

en: My father's car is made in Italy.
zh: 我爸的车是意大利产的。

en: After his father died, he had to study by himself.
zh: 他爸去世后，他只好自学了。

en: He took charge of the firm after his father's death.
zh: 他爸去世后，他接管了公司。

en: He was the only recourse for his family after his father's death.
zh: 他爸去世后，他成了全家唯一的依靠。

en: The shock of her father's death lingered on and she didn't feel like going out at all.
zh: 她爸去世对她的打击很大，她现在一点都不想出门。

en: The property left him by his father enables him to live in comfort.
zh: 他爸留下的遗产让他生活得很安逸。

en: My father's factory turns out 30,000 cars each month.
zh: 我爸的工厂每个月生产三万辆车。

en: I was beside myself when I heard the news of my father's sudden death.
zh: 听到我爸突然去世的消息，我整个人都崩溃了。

en: Put it on my father's account.
zh: 记在我爸账上吧。

en: But God the only begotten Son, who is at the Father's side, has made him known.
zh: 只有在父怀里的独生子，将他表明了出来。

en: My father's company is on the verge of bankruptcy.
zh: 我爸的公司快倒闭了。

en: My father's little library consisted chiefly of books on polemic divinity, most of which I read.
zh: 我爸的小书房里主要是关于神学争论的书，我大部分都读过。

en: It's hard for my father to give up drinking.
zh: 我爸很难戒酒。

en: I gave it up after my father had given me a good scolding.
zh: 被我爸狠狠训了一顿后，我就没再干了。

en: My father's work is to buy wool.
zh: 我爸的工作是收购羊毛。

en: I discussed it with my father and decided to change my job.
zh: 我跟我爸商量了一下，决定换个工作。

en: My father and sister are carpenters.
zh: 我爸和我姐都是木匠。

en: My father and mother were sitting under a tree.
zh: 我爸和我妈正坐在树下。

en: My family consists of my father, mother, and sister.
zh: 我家有我爸、我妈和我姐。

en: My family is my sister, father and mother.
zh: 我家有我姐、我爸和我妈。

en: My family has my father, my mother, and my little sister.
zh: 我家有我爸、我妈和我妹妹。

en: My father and I played tennis on Sunday.
zh: 周日我和我爸去打了网球。

en: Father and I go fishing once in a while.
zh: 我跟我爸偶尔去钓钓鱼。

en: He seems not to be aware of the conflict between my father and me.
zh: 他好像没察觉到我跟我爸之间的矛盾。

en: I feel uneasy in my father's presence.
zh: 我在我爸面前总觉得不自在。

en: Do you think Dad will change his mind?
zh: 你觉得我爸会改主意吗？

en: Where did dad go?
zh: 我爸去哪了？

en: What were you doing, Dad?
zh: 爸，你刚才在干嘛？

en: Father vouched for his friend.
zh: 我爸为他朋友做了担保。

en: My father repaired my old watch.
zh: 我爸修好了我的旧手表。

en: Father is busy, so I will go instead.
zh: 我爸挺忙的，所以我替他去。

en: My plan to study abroad went by the board when my father died.
zh: 我爸去世后，我的出国计划就泡汤了。

en: My father has been dead for three years.
zh: 我爸已经去世三年了。

en: It has been ten years since my father passed away.
zh: 我爸去世已经十年了。

en: As our father got ill, we had to live on a small income.
zh: 因为我爸病了，我们只能靠微薄的收入过日子。

en: Father suddenly got sick and we sent for a doctor.
zh: 我爸突然生病了，我们赶紧去请了医生。

en: My father being sick, I had to stay home.
zh: 因为我爸病了，我得留在家里。

en: My father bought some CDs for my birthday.
zh: 我爸给我买了一些CD当生日礼物。

en: My father told me about his experiences during the war.
zh: 我爸跟我讲了他在战争时期的经历。

en: The house where my father was born is just around the corner.
zh: 我爸出生的那栋房子就在拐角那儿。

en: If my father had not been killed in the war, he would be over sixty years old now.
zh: 要是我爸没在战争中牺牲，他现在都六十多岁了。

en: Since our father is bedridden, we take turns looking after him.
zh: 因为我爸卧病在床，我们轮流照顾他。

en: I hear my father was as old as I am now when he came up to Tokyo.
zh: 听说我爸去东京那会儿，跟我现在一般大。

en: My father was about to leave when the telephone rang.
zh: 电话响的时候，我爸正准备出门。

en: My father will help me.
zh: 我爸会帮我的。

en: My father has been out of work for a year.
zh: 我爸已经失业一年了。

en: Father has lost his job, and what's worse, Mother has fallen ill.
zh: 我爸丢了工作，更糟的是，我妈也病倒了。

en: My father has made me what I am.
zh: 是我爸成就了现在的我。

en: My father made me what I am today.
zh: 是我爸让我有了今天。

en: My father stood guarantee for my debts.
zh: 我爸为我的债务做了担保。

en: My father made me a nice lunch.
zh: 我爸给我做了一顿丰盛的午餐。

en: My father made me a delicious lunch.
zh: 我爸给我做了一顿好吃的午餐。

en: This is one thing my father left to me.
zh: 这是我爸留给我的一样东西。

en: The death of his father filled him with sorrow.
zh: 父亲的去世让他感到非常悲痛。

en: It is ten years since my father died.
zh: 我爸去世已经十年了。

en: It's been ten years since my father died.
zh: 我爸已经走了十年了。

en: Five years have gone by since my father died.
zh: 我爸去世五年了。

en: It is three years since my father died.
zh: 我爸去世三年了。

en: It's been three years since my father died.
zh: 我爸都已经走三年了。

en: Ten years have gone by since my father died.
zh: 我爸去世已经整整十年了。

en: Now that Father is gone, we can talk freely.
zh: 既然我爸不在，我们可以敞开聊聊。

en: My father will support me financially.
zh: 我爸会在经济上支持我。

en: I don't think my father is willing to lend us the car.
zh: 我觉得我爸不会愿意把车借给我们。

en: I helped my father water the flowers.
zh: 我帮我爸浇了花。

en: Father came home.
zh: 我爸回家了。

en: There's no reason why I should become a physician because my father is one.
zh: 没理由因为我爸是医生，我也得当医生。

en: A computer game was given to me by my father.
zh: 我爸送了我一个电脑游戏。

en: My father gives you his regards.
zh: 我爸向你问好。

en: Would that my father had lived longer.
zh: 要是我爸能活得再久一点就好了。

en: I wish my father had lived longer.
zh: 我真希望我爸当初能活得长久一些。

en: My father is dropping me off at the airport along the way.
zh: 我爸顺路送我去机场。

en: I lost the watch Father had given me.
zh: 我把我爸送我的表弄丢了。

en: I lost the watch my father had given me.
zh: 我把我爸送的那块表给丢了。

en: My father's death from cancer challenged me to take up research on it.
zh: 我爸因癌症去世，这促使我开始从事癌症研究。

en: I don't know when my father will come back.
zh: 我不知道我爸什么时候回来。

en: My father has five brothers and sisters.
zh: 我爸有五个兄弟姐妹。

en: The tramp gobbled down the Thanksgiving dinner served at the church.
zh: 那个流浪汉狼吞虎咽地吃光了教堂提供的感恩节晚餐。

en: No one is free from worldly cares.
zh: 谁都免不了有俗世的烦恼。

en: His romance was the talk of the town.
zh: 他的风流韵事传遍了全镇。

en: Now it rises, now it sinks.
zh: 它一会儿升起，一会儿落下。

en: The local train is less comfortable than the express train.
zh: 普通列车没有特快列车舒服。

en: I'd like to rent a regular car.
zh: 我想租一辆普通的轿车。

en: I usually take size eight shoes.
zh: 我通常穿8码的鞋。

en: I generally have lunch there.
zh: 我一般在那儿吃午饭。

en: The host usually carves the roast at the table.
zh: 主人通常会在餐桌上切烤肉。

en: As a rule, it doesn't snow much here.
zh: 一般来说，这儿不怎么下雪。

en: A person with average intelligence would understand that.
zh: 智力正常的人都能理解。

en: Though it is true that every normal human being is able to use language, it is misleading to compare this with his ability to eat, sleep, or walk.
zh: 虽然正常人确实都会说话，但把这种能力与吃、睡或走路相比，是会误导人的。

en: The average man fails not because he lacks ability, but because he lacks ability to concentrate.
zh: 普通人的失败不是因为没能力，而是因为没法集中精力。

en: The average nurse is entitled to three weeks' holiday a year.
zh: 普通护士每年有三周假期。

en: Would you like regular prints?
zh: 您需要普通冲印吗？

en: An average American child, by all accounts, falls in love with TV.
zh: 大家都说，普通的美国孩子都很爱看电视。

en: We usually modify our views in college.
zh: 我们在大学里通常会改变一些看法。

en: As a rule, I don't drink coffee.
zh: 我一般不喝咖啡。

en: I left home later than usual, but fortunately I was in time for the train.
zh: 我出门比平时晚，但还好赶上了火车。

en: My friend usually helps my son with his studies.
zh: 我朋友经常辅导我儿子的功课。

en: That gentleman usually wears a hat.
zh: 那位先生平时总戴着帽子。

en: Rugs absorb sound.
zh: 地毯能吸音。

en: Let's shake the rug.
zh: 我们来抖抖地毯吧。

en: Do you require a security deposit?
zh: 需要交押金吗？

en: I was terribly frightened.
zh: 我被吓坏了。

en: Because I was scared.
zh: 因为我害怕。

en: Prefectures are governmental divisions of France and Japan.
zh: “县”和“省”分别是日本和法国的行政区划。

en: My futon was peeled away.
zh: 我的被子被掀开了。

en: Fold up your bedding.
zh: 把被子叠好。

en: Futons are our bedding.
zh: 被褥就是我们的寝具。

en: Cut the cloth in a diagonal direction.
zh: 沿着斜角剪这块布。

en: Cut the cloth diagonally.
zh: 把布斜着剪。

en: The cloth was dyed bright red.
zh: 这块布染成了鲜红色。

en: Tomiko guessed my weight.
zh: 富子猜中了我的体重。

en: No other mountain in Japan is higher than Mt. Fuji.
zh: 日本没有比富士山更高的山了。

en: No other mountain in Japan is as high as Mt. Fuji.
zh: 日本没有哪座山跟富士山一样高。

en: Mt. Fuji is about four times as high as Mt. Rokko.
zh: 富士山的高度大约是六甲山的四倍。

en: Mt. Fuji is the highest mountain in Japan.
zh: 富士山是日本最高的山。

en: Mt. Fuji is higher than any other mountain in Japan.
zh: 富士山比日本其他任何山都要高。

en: Mt. Fuji is the most famous mountain in Japan.
zh: 富士山是日本最有名的山。

en: Mt. Fuji is Japan's most famous mountain.
zh: 富士山是日本最出名的山。

en: Mt. Fuji is covered with snow in winter.
zh: 富士山在冬天被白雪覆盖。

en: Mt. Fuji is covered with snow in the winter.
zh: 富士山冬天是有积雪的。

en: Mt. Fuji soars heavenward.
zh: 富士山耸入云霄。

en: The top of Mt. Fuji is covered with snow.
zh: 富士山顶覆盖着白雪。

en: Mt. Fuji was covered with snow.
zh: 富士山当时覆盖着雪。

en: I can't picture what Mt. Fuji looks like in the spring.
zh: 我无法想象富士山春天的样子。

en: Mt. Fuji is noted for its beautiful shape.
zh: 富士山以其优美的山形而闻名。

en: Mt. Fuji was above the clouds.
zh: 富士山就在云端之上。

en: Mt. Fuji is known to everyone.
zh: 富士山人尽皆知。

en: Mt. Fuji is very beautiful.
zh: 富士山非常漂亮。

en: Mt. Fuji is not as high as Mt. Everest.
zh: 富士山没有珠穆朗玛峰高。

en: Mt. Fuji is not as tall as Mt. Everest.
zh: 富士山没有珠穆朗玛峰那么高。

en: Mt. Fuji isn't as tall as Mt. Everest.
zh: 富士山没珠峰那么高。

en: Mt. Fuji is 3776 meters high.
zh: 富士山高3776米。

en: The top of Mt. Fuji was covered with snow.
zh: 富士山的山顶上盖着雪。

en: A snow-clad Mt. Fuji is fabulously beautiful.
zh: 覆雪的富士山简直美极了。

en: How high is Mt. Fuji?
zh: 富士山有多高？

en: I will have climbed Mt. Fuji four times if I climb it again.
zh: 如果我再去爬一次富士山，就是第四次了。

en: I had a marvelous view of Mt. Fuji.
zh: 我看到的富士山景色美极了。

en: A mirage sometimes shows up in Toyama Bay.
zh: 富山湾有时会出现海市蜃楼。

en: It is easier for a camel to pass through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of God.
zh: 骆驼穿过针眼比财主进天国还容易。

en: The rich grow richer and the poor grow poorer.
zh: 富的越富，穷的越穷。

en: Wealth does not always bring us happiness.
zh: 财富并不总是能带来幸福。

en: Wealth may be a factor of happiness.
zh: 财富可能是幸福的一个因素。

en: Wisdom is better than gold or silver.
zh: 智慧胜过金银。

en: Wealth, as such, does not matter much.
zh: 财富这东西，其实没那么重要。

en: Wealth, as such, does not bring happiness.
zh: 财富本身并不能带来幸福。

en: They argue that the distribution of wealth should be equitable.
zh: 他们认为财富分配应该公平。

en: Riches have wings.
zh: 财富是长了翅膀的。

en: For all his wealth and fame, he is a lonely man.
zh: 尽管他有名有利，但他依然是个孤独的人。

en: Do you want to buy the position with your wealth?
zh: 你想用钱买这个官职吗？

en: Despite all his wealth, he is stingy.
zh: 尽管他很有钱，但他这人特别抠门。

en: Despite his riches, he's not contented.
zh: 虽然他很富有，但他并不满足。

en: Can I speak to the head nurse?
zh: 我能跟护士长谈谈吗？

en: I would like to speak to the head nurse.
zh: 我想找一下护士长。

en: Where is the ladies' room?
zh: 女洗手间在哪儿？

en: The constitution was amended so that women could vote.
zh: 宪法修改后，女性才有了投票权。

en: She smiled at me with friendly brown eyes.
zh: 她那双友好的褐色眼睛微笑着看着我。

en: The lady tolerated the man.
zh: 那位女士容忍了那个男人。

en: You must take off your hats in the presence of ladies.
zh: 在女士面前，你应该摘掉帽子。

en: There are many careers open to women.
zh: 有很多职业都对女性开放。

en: It's so nice to be by ourselves.
zh: 就咱们两个人在一起的感觉真好。

en: It is good to feel that nothing can come between a man and wife.
zh: 夫妻之间没有隔阂的感觉真好。

en: The couple quarreled, but soon made up.
zh: 那两口子吵了一架，但很快就和好了。

en: The relationship between husband and wife should be based on love.
zh: 夫妻关系应该建立在爱的基础上。

en: The couple separated, never to see each other again.
zh: 这对夫妻分开了，再也没见过面。

en: Husbands and wives should stand by each other throughout their lives.
zh: 夫妻应该一辈子互相扶持。

en: Husbands and wives should help each other as long as they live.
zh: 夫妻俩应该一辈子互相照应。

en: The couple decided to adopt an orphan.
zh: 这对夫妇决定收养一个孤儿。

en: Married couples can apply for the post.
zh: 已婚夫妇可以申请这个职位。

en: No one in his right mind wants anything to do with a domestic quarrel.
zh: 正常人谁都不想掺和别人的家务事。

en: It is quite natural the couple should love each other.
zh: 夫妻俩恩恩爱爱是理所当然的事。

en: The couple put their house on the market.
zh: 那对夫妇把房子挂牌出售了。

en: The couple transformed chemistry into a modern science.
zh: 这对夫妇把化学转变成了一门现代科学。

en: She has gone to the bad since she lost her husband.
zh: 自从丈夫去世后，她就开始自暴自弃了。

en: A woman whose husband has died is a widow.
zh: 丈夫去世的女人被称为寡妇。

en: The widowed mother had to go through a lot of hardships.
zh: 那位守寡的母亲吃了不少苦。

en: My husband is indifferent to his clothes.
zh: 我老公对他穿什么一点都不在乎。

en: Her husband demanded that she tell him the whole truth.
zh: 她丈夫要求她如实交代真相。

en: My husband has his breakfast while reading the newspaper.
zh: 我老公边吃早饭边看报纸。

en: My husband reads the newspaper while eating breakfast.
zh: 我老公看报纸的时候顺便吃早饭。

en: My husband is out of work and looking for a job.
zh: 我老公失业了，正在找工作。

en: The husband accommodated his plan to his wife's.
zh: 丈夫调整了自己的计划来配合妻子。

en: My husband is better able to cook than I.
zh: 我老公做饭比我强。

en: My husband was called away on business.
zh: 我老公出差去了。

en: In contrast to her, her husband didn't seem to be enjoying the shopping.
zh: 跟她相反，她老公似乎并不喜欢逛街。

en: My husband is in high spirits today.
zh: 我老公今天兴致很高。

en: Men make houses, women make homes.
zh: 男人建房子，女人建家庭。

en: It won't be long before my husband comes back.
zh: 我老公很快就回来了。

en: My husband enjoys his glass once in a while.
zh: 我老公偶尔喜欢喝两杯。

en: My husband is always reading in bed.
zh: 我老公老是躺在床上看书。

en: My husband earns $100,000 a year.
zh: 我老公一年挣十万美金。

en: She said that her husband hit her, but in fact it was the other way around.
zh: 她说她老公打了她，但其实刚好相反。

en: She took over the business after her husband died.
zh: 丈夫去世后，她接管了那门生意。

en: After my husband's death I walked around like a zombie.
zh: 丈夫去世后，我就跟行尸走肉一样。

en: She has lived alone ever since her husband died.
zh: 自从丈夫去世后，她就一直一个人住。

en: Since her husband's death, she has been living alone.
zh: 自从她丈夫去世，她就一直独自生活。

en: After her husband's death, she brought up the two children all by herself.
zh: 丈夫去世后，她一个人拉扯大了两个孩子。

en: Her husband's health is very precious to her.
zh: 她非常看重她丈夫的健康。

en: After her husband's death, she brought up the four children by herself.
zh: 丈夫死后，她独自抚养大了四个孩子。

en: It is high time we reconstructed new family relationships and formed a comfortable life.
zh: 我们该重新处理下家庭关系，过上舒服的日子了。

en: Her husband's death has tried her severely.
zh: 丈夫的去世对她是极大的考验。

en: A woman whose husband is dead is called a widow.
zh: 死了丈夫的女人被称为寡妇。

en: When my husband died, I had a lot of difficulties keeping my chin up.
zh: 丈夫去世的时候，我很难振作起来。

en: Compared with her husband, she is not so careful.
zh: 和她丈夫比起来，她没那么细心。

en: A lady, whose husband is a famous scientist, came over from the other side.
zh: 一位女士从那边走过来，她丈夫是个著名的科学家。

en: After her husband died, her baby was all in all to her.
zh: 丈夫去世后，孩子就是她的全部。

en: She flared up at the sight of her husband walking with another woman.
zh: 一看到丈夫和别的女人走在一起，她一下子就火了。

en: She wanted for nothing as long as her husband lived.
zh: 只要丈夫还活着，她就什么都不缺。

en: Her heart broke when her husband died.
zh: 丈夫去世时，她心都碎了。

en: When her husband died, she felt like committing suicide.

zh: 他在百岁生日的前几天去世了。

en: Get off at Himeji Station.

en: There is more water than is needed.

zh: 山下现在走投无路了。他精心策划的项目被毙了，费劲写的书也卖不动。

zh: 我肯定不会让你失望的。

en: I'll do it by all means.

en: I'll do that for sure.

en: Be sure to pick up some milk.

en: Please make sure that the door is locked.
zh: 记得把门锁好。

en: Make sure to turn off the TV.

en: You will never fail to be moved by the sight.

en: Growing children should not always be handled with kid gloves.

en: Be sure to mail this letter.

en: Bitter medicine will not necessarily do you good.

en: I will come by all means.

en: I'll definitely come.

en: By all means, you must come.

en: Never fail to come here by five.

en: I'll be there at two o'clock without fail.

en: See to it that all the items are arranged in a row.

en: Be sure to fill in the blanks from top to bottom beforehand.

en: See that all the items are arranged in a row.
zh: 把这些东西都排成一排。

en: Take a seat in the armchair and calm down a while.

en: Lay the napkin across your lap.
zh: 把餐巾铺在膝盖上。

en: I cut myself while shaving.
zh: 我刮胡子的时候把脸给刮破了。

en: I have a head cold.

en: You are talking through the nose.

en: I have a runny nose.

en: Your nose is running.
zh: 你流鼻涕了。

en: My nose is running.
zh: 我流鼻涕了。

en: My nose was very runny.
zh: 我刚才鼻涕流得很厉害。

en: The mucus is greenish yellow.
zh: 鼻涕是黄绿色的。

en: I can't stop my nosebleed.

en: Don't pick your nose.
zh: 别抠鼻子。

en: It's difficult to balance a ball on your nose.
zh: 用鼻子顶住球保持平衡挺难的。

en: Please breathe through your nose.
zh: 请用鼻子呼吸。

en: I can't breathe through my nose.
zh: 我鼻子不通气。

en: My nose is stuffed up.
zh: 我鼻子堵了。

en: My nose is itchy.
zh: 我鼻子有点痒。

en: I have a stuffed-up nose.
zh: 我鼻塞了。

en: Miwako, I want you to meet Kenny.
zh: 美和子，我想介绍肯尼给你认识。

en: Miyuki has a camera, but she doesn't like it.
zh: 美雪有个相机，但她不喜欢。

en: She prides herself on her beauty.
zh: 她以自己的美貌为傲。

en: Beauty is but skin deep.
zh: 美貌只是皮囊。

en: Beauty is only skin deep.
zh: 美貌终究是肤浅的。

en: Miho plays the piano.
zh: 美穗弹钢琴。

en: Miho is a pianist.
zh: 美穗是个钢琴家。

en: Midori sometimes drops consonants.
zh: 绿子有时会漏掉辅音。

en: Virtue and vice.
zh: 美德与恶习。

en: Michiko talks as if she had been to the Arctic herself.
zh: 美智子说起话来就像她亲自去过北极一样。

zh: 美代子单恋了那么久，我觉得她都要烧心了。

en: Miyuki set the table for the party.
zh: 美雪为派对摆好了餐具。

en: Beautiful women die young - or so the saying goes. If so then my wife is going to live a long life.

en: She's also a beauty.

en: She wasn't beautiful, but she had big, kind brown eyes and a sweet smile.
zh: 她虽不漂亮，但有一双温柔的褐色大眼睛和甜美的微笑。

en: She is beautiful.

en: She's beautiful, isn't she?

zh: 你去看了画展吗？

en: The art dealer guaranteed the picture genuine.
zh: 艺术品商人保证这幅画是真迹。

zh: 去博物馆的公交车站在哪儿？

en: Beauty is truth, truth beauty.

zh: 那是一个阳光明媚的好天气。

en: It's a beautiful day.

en: No animal builds beautiful churches, plays tennis, tells jokes, writes songs or visits the moon.
zh: 没有动物会建漂亮的教堂、打网球、讲笑话、写歌，或者去月球。

zh: 当我面对美好的事物，我发现除了凝视和赞叹，我什么也做不了。

zh: 它们给我的感觉非常美妙，但我没法留住它，也没法一直重复；世上最美好的东西，最后都会让我觉得厌倦。

en: The beautiful is not always the same as the good.

zh: 一架飞机在跑道上降落了。

en: Airplanes have made it easy to travel abroad.
zh: 飞机让出国旅游变得很方便。

en: What time did the plane arrive at Narita?

en: The plane was lost sight of in the clouds.

en: The plane is flying above the clouds.
zh: 飞机在云层上面飞。

en: The plane flew above the clouds.
zh: 飞机在云上飞。

en: The plane was approaching London.

en: Some people say that traveling by plane is rather economical.
zh: 有人说坐飞机挺划算的。

en: The airplane soon went out of sight.
zh: 飞机很快就看不见了。

en: The plane was on the point of taking off.
zh: 飞机马上就要起飞了。

zh: 飞机晚了一小时才起飞。

en: The plane took off easily.
zh: 飞机很顺利地起飞了。

en: You don't necessarily have to go to the airport to reconfirm your plane reservation.
zh: 你确认机票预订不一定非得去机场。

zh: 飞机的速度比直升机快多了。

en: Flying is the quickest way to travel.
zh: 坐飞机是旅行最快的方式。

en: It will cost you more to go by plane.
zh: 坐飞机去会更贵。

en: How much will it cost you to go by air?
zh: 坐飞机去得花多少钱？

en: How long will it take by plane?
zh: 坐飞机要多久？

en: How long does it take to go to Okinawa by plane?
zh: 坐飞机去冲绳要多长时间？

en: Maybe it's the low air pressure that means you get drunk more easily on planes.
zh: 可能是因为气压低，在飞机上更容易喝醉。

en: Flying is the quickest method of travelling.
zh: 坐飞机是旅行最快的方法。

en: We'll fly there in 50 minutes.
zh: 我们坐飞机50分钟就能到。

en: I was very nervous as the plane took off.
zh: 飞机起飞的时候我紧张极了。

en: It's natural to be nervous when the plane takes off.
zh: 飞机起飞时会紧张很正常。

en: The plane was about to take off when I heard a strange sound.
zh: 飞机正要起飞时，我听到了一声怪响。

en: The plane exploded and plunged into the ocean, killing all the people on board.
zh: 飞机爆炸坠入大海，机上人员全部遇难。

en: Airplanes have taken the place of electric trains.
zh: 飞机已经取代了电车。

en: The airplane fell to the earth.
zh: 飞机坠落到了地面。

en: I inquired whether the plane would arrive on time.
zh: 我打听了一下飞机是不是准点到。

en: The plane flew toward the west.
zh: 飞机向西飞去了。

en: I read in the newspaper where contact with the plane had been lost.
zh: 我从报纸上看到飞机失联了。

en: The newspaper said that contact with the plane had been lost.
zh: 报纸上说飞机失去了联系。

en: The planes arrived one after another.
zh: 飞机一架接一架地抵达了。

en: One plane after another took off.
zh: 飞机一架接一架地起飞了。

en: It is certain that the plane will reach there on time.
zh: 飞机肯定能准时到。

en: I saw a plane.
zh: 我看见了一架飞机。

en: I saw an airplane.
zh: 我看见了一架飞机。

en: We watched the plane until it went out of sight.
zh: 我们目送着飞机直到看不见为止。

en: The airplane climbed sharply.
zh: 飞机在急剧爬升。

en: If planes are dangerous, cars are much more so.
zh: 如果说飞机危险，那汽车可就危险多了。

en: Please stay seated until the plane comes to a complete stop.
zh: 在飞机完全停稳之前，请留在座位上。

en: Seen from an airplane, the island looks like a big spider.
zh: 从飞机上看，那个岛就像一只大蜘蛛。

en: Small hills look flat from an airplane.
zh: 从飞机上看，小山丘看起来是平的。

en: Seen from the plane, the islands were very pretty.
zh: 从飞机上看，那些岛屿非常漂亮。

en: Seeing these islands from the airplane, we thought that they were really beautiful.
zh: 在飞机上看到这些岛屿时，我们觉得它们真的太美了。

en: We enjoyed a grand view of the Alps from the airplane.
zh: 我们在飞机上欣赏了阿尔卑斯山的壮丽景色。

en: The plane flew over Kate's house.
zh: 飞机从凯特家上空飞过。

en: I saw five airplanes flying away like so many birds.
zh: 我看到五架飞机像一群鸟一样飞走了。

en: An airplane is flying overhead.
zh: 头顶上有一架飞机在飞。

en: The universe on the earth is constituted of atoms.
zh: 地球上的万物都是由原子构成的。

en: It is in the nature of birds to fly and build nests.
zh: 飞行和筑巢是鸟类的天性。

en: I can no more predict the future than I can fly.
zh: 我要是能预测未来，我都能飞了。

en: Look before you leap.
zh: 三思而后行。

en: Some fish fly.
zh: 有些鱼会飞。

en: There are also fish that fly.
zh: 也有会飞的鱼。

en: You shouldn't skip in reading.
zh: 读书的时候不该跳着看。

en: The greater the genius, the longer it takes the world to find it out and understand it.
zh: 越是伟大的天才，世界就越需要时间去发现和理解他。

en: Mahatma Gandhi, the apostle of nonviolence, was born in 1869.
zh: “非暴力”倡导者圣雄甘地出生于1869年。

en: Non-violence is the first article of my faith.
zh: 非暴力是我信仰的首要准则。

en: I had an artificial insemination by donor.
zh: 我接受了供精人工授精。

en: It is you who are to blame.
zh: 应该怪你。

en: It is he who is to blame.
zh: 应该怪他。

en: Where's the emergency exit?
zh: 紧急出口在哪？

en: Call the police in an emergency.
zh: 遇到紧急情况请报警。

en: In an emergency, use the stairway, not the elevator.
zh: 紧急情况下走楼梯，别坐电梯。

en: You must be prepared for an emergency.
zh: 你得做好应对突发状况的准备。

en: He was so frightened that he ran for his life.
zh: 他吓得拼命逃跑。

en: That was a very delicate situation.
zh: 那种情况当时挺微妙的。

en: I am so tired that I can't study.
zh: 我累得都没法学习了。

en: It was such a fine day that we had a very good time.
zh: 天气太好了，我们玩得很开心。

en: It was such a fine day that many children were playing in the park.
zh: 天气这么好，好多小孩都在公园里玩。

en: The anxiety of sellers to avail of prices which look very high.
zh: 卖家都急着想趁现在的高价赶紧卖掉。

en: I am in deep water.
zh: 我现在的处境挺难的。

en: Thousands of people were deceived by the advertisement.
zh: 成千上万的人都被那个广告给骗了。

en: Being very clever and gentle, this dog is a good companion to me.
zh: 这狗又聪明又听话，是个好伴侣。

en: A most horrible thing befell him.
zh: 他碰到了一件极其可怕的事。

en: A really bad thing happened to him.
zh: 他出了件挺糟糕的事。

en: An extremely terrible thing happened to him.
zh: 他遇到了一件特别恐怖的事。

en: Being able to smile while in great distress is not duck soup for a passionate individual.
zh: 在极度痛苦中还能笑得出来，对重感情的人来说可不是小菜一碟。

en: He looks very down-at-the-heels.
zh: 他看起来挺落魄的。

en: Much to my joy, I have passed the examination.
zh: 真开心，我考试过了。

en: It was such a nice joke that everybody burst out laughing.
zh: 那个笑话太逗了，大家都笑喷了。

en: The irrational conversation continued.
zh: 那场毫无逻辑的谈话还在继续。

en: Strong measures should be taken against wrong doers.
zh: 得对干坏事的人采取严厉措施。

en: We are concerned about the further actualization of current problems among youth, such as truancy, dislike of school and lack of appropriate character development.
zh: 我们挺担心现在的青少年问题，比如旷课、厌学和性格养成不到位。

en: Non-smokers are rallying behind the new anti-smoking law.
zh: 不抽烟的人都在支持那个禁烟新法。

en: I couldn't find my non-virtual address book until only a few minutes ago.
zh: 几分钟前我才找到那本纸质通讯录。

en: I use birth control.
zh: 我在避孕。

en: I'd like to have an intra-uterine device.
zh: 我想上个节育环。

en: I don't use birth control.
zh: 我没采取避孕措施。

en: The refugees struggled against hunger.
zh: 难民们在和饥饿抗争。

en: Refugees will suffer lack of food, water, medicine and all that.
zh: 难民们会面临缺水、缺粮、没药这些困难。

en: The refugees barely escaped death.
zh: 那些难民死里逃生。

en: Another thing to avoid is to use too much praise.
zh: 还有一点要避免，就是夸得太过了。

en: We will lump together all expenses.
zh: 我们会把所有开支算在一起。

en: Apart from the cost, it will take long to build the bridge.
zh: 抛开成本不说，修这桥得花好长时间。

en: Apart from the cost, it will take a long time to build the bridge.
zh: 除了钱的问题，修这桥也得花挺久。

en: The expenses average ten dollars a day.
zh: 平均每天开销十美金。

en: The expense will fall on him.
zh: 这笔开销得由他来出。

en: The cost amounted to five thousand yen.
zh: 费用总计五千日元。

en: The expense is 10000 yen at lowest.
zh: 这笔开销最少也要一万日元。

en: The cost will run into thousands of dollars.
zh: 成本得好几千美金。

en: The expenses are ten thousand yen per head.
zh: 费用是每人一万日元。

en: The cost apart, the building will take a lot of time.
zh: 先不管钱的事，盖这栋楼得花不少时间。

en: The budget was cut to the bone.
zh: 预算被砍得很厉害。

en: Though it is expensive, we'll go by air.
zh: 虽然贵点，我们还是坐飞机去。

en: Apart from its cost, the plan was a good one.
zh: 撇开成本不谈，这计划还挺好。

en: I don't care about the expense.
zh: 我不在乎花多少钱。

en: They provide value for money.
zh: 他们的东西性价比很高。

en: We provide value for money.
zh: 我们的产品物超所值。

en: I'll provide value for money.
zh: 我会让你觉得物有所值。

en: The breakfast is included in the charge.
zh: 房费里含早餐。

en: That's enough money to cover the expenses.
zh: 那些钱够付开销了。

en: It's not easy to figure out the cost.
zh: 很难算清楚到底得花多少钱。
